XenotypeDef.label: Egg-Cubator
XenotypeDef.description: Eggcubators are handpicked individuals who have proven their loyalty and diligent service to the Eggblessed and the Golden Duck of Rimdorado. They have had a Golden Egg placed inside them which enforces a dependence and undying loyalty towards the Eggblessed, in exchange they gain a fraction of the power their overlords possess.
